overview: Ever see the one where a bunch of nerds help the Fraternity slobs spy on the naked Sorority sweethearts? You sure have... at least a dozen times or more. But you've never seen it with the Jim Holliday touch. Tons of T&A tease, the expected sizzling sex scenes and a story that's beyond stupid. All the elements necessary to make SORORITY SHOWER CAM rise above the routine porn fodder.
title: Sorority Shower Cam
